subject: RE: 102444 - [Type 4] Pension Fund 2 SA vs. CBNA : Margin Notice, Portfolio Statement
content:
Hello Team , 

We fully agree with your margin call request.

CDN will pay 1.830.000,00 € for Value 22-08-2018 

regards


Xxxxxx XXXXXXX

De : XXXXXXX.XXXXX@XXXX.com [mailto: XXXXXXX.XXXXX@XXXX.com ] Ojbjet : 102444 - [Type 4] Pension Fund 2 SA vs. CBNA : Margin Notice, Portfolio Statement

Good Morning,

Please see attached today's margin call

In the event of a dispute please revert with your MTM / IA and collateral balance and if you are not in tri resolve your portfolio in excel format.

Thanks and Regards,
XXXXXXX.XXXXX@XXXX.xxx

Group Line: +11-11-1111-1111
Group Email: XXXXXXX@XXXX.xxx
